summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Wellington Avenue, from the existing pavement south of East James Street to Randolph Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8333 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
